caption: Figure 1: Detailed F1 scores of each label for CBT-CD and CBT-FC.
description: The radar chart visualizes the detailed F1 scores of each label for CBT-CD and CBT-FC datasets across six different LLMs.

caption: Figure 1: Detailed F1 scores of each label for CBT-CD and CBT-FC.
description: The radar chart visualizes the F1 scores achieved by six different LLMs across various labels for CBT-CD and CBT-FC datasets, showcasing their performance in cognitive model understanding tasks.

caption: Figure 2: The overall pairwise comparison of different models vs. reference across difficulty level.
description: The chart displays the overall pairwise comparison of three different LLMs against human expert responses across three difficulty levels (beginner, intermediate, advanced) in a CBT therapeutic response generation task.

caption: Figure 4: Detailed accuracies on different types of knowledge for CBT-QA and the F1 score of each label for CBT-PC.
description: The radar chart visualizes the performance of six LLMs on different aspects of CBT knowledge acquisition and cognitive model understanding, showing varying levels of proficiency across different task types.

caption: Figure 4: Detailed accuracies on different types of knowledge for CBT-QA and the F1 score of each label for CBT-PC.
description: The radar chart visualizes the performance of six large language models on two tasks: CBT knowledge acquisition (CBT-QA) and primary core belief classification (CBT-PC).

caption: Figure 5: The win-tie-loss comparison among different models on three difficulty levels.
description: The chart displays the win-tie-loss results for three LLMs (Llama-3.1-405B, Llama-3.1-8B, and GPT-40) across three difficulty levels (beginner, intermediate, and advanced) in the therapeutic response generation task.
